W07_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W07_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: Cinq: World of the Four Tribes

W07_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_WRLD_SIUG_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: On the other side of the door, you find what looks to be a ruined temple. Four tribes exist in this world, but is there any darkness?

W07_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLESOUL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_SIUG_TEMPLESOUL_000_DETAIL.text: The darkness of the four tribes now dwells within you as a thrall. You can't wait to see what awaits you in the next world.

W07_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_SIUG_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: There was nothing for you in this world. Hopefully the next one will be different.
